title: treeline more often!!!!
body: why can we not have treeline all day every day!!!!!!!!!

replies.body: Simply put; because there is not enough people to populate the matchmaking and create consistent even matches. With a smaller population this can be a real problem, so they limit it to times when enough people play it to that's not an issue. If the player numbers show it can handle a longer period of time and remain healthy, Riot will be able to expand it.
